description: Expected measurements for Axiom enclave runner binaries

0.1.0.notes: Initial v0.x release - measurement will be computed after first reproducible build

0.1.0-simulator.notes: Simulator mode for development and testing - NO SECURITY GUARANTEES

steps: 1. Build the enclave runner with: npm run build:enclave
2. Compute SHA-384 of the binary: sha384sum enclave/runner/target/release/libaxiom_enclave_runner.so
3. Compare with measurement in this file
4. For stricter verification: Use a reproducible build system to verify measurements independently

reproducibleBuild.notes: See .github/workflows/reproducible-build.yml for full reproducible build configuration

updatePolicy.process: Measurements updated via CI/CD after reproducible build verification
updatePolicy.approval: Security team review required for measurement changes
